sendServerRequest

private RemoteProcess sendServerRequest(java.lang.String distantServer,
                                        DPMessage message)
Sending a request for the creation of a remote process to a distant server.

Parameters:
distantServer - : Distant server name
message - : DPMessage filled with the binary data
Returns:
A remote reference to the newly created process

rexec

public int rexec(MSMember member,
                 java.lang.String path)
Initiates an remote execution request to a specified member with a given executable file

Parameters:
member - : member to send the request
path - : path to the executable file
Returns:
PID if successful / -1 otherwise
